name: Inperception
description:
Inperception is a puzzle game in 1st person about a Focuser (an individual capable of altering his perception) who loses his assault team in a dangerous rescue operation of the Chrono Utility Mechanism, which he must reach alone by overcoming the dangers of a security complex. The game will use the different perceptions using only audio or only image tobreak the reality of the environment and generate puzzles on a double level. It will also have aartifact that adds depth to puzzles by playing with the perception of time, moving forward or backward not only objects but also the Focuser.

This is a group  project .  The authors are:  Álvaro Gil Migueláñez, Luis Antonio Lara Granado, Héctor Lotero Torres, Jorge Ruiz Gallego y Virgilio Navarro Prada.

Here it is Álvaro Gil Miguelañez itch.io. Check it out! 

https://alvaro-gil.itch.io/

It was made with Unity using additional assets. This is a prototype that tries show a game mechanic not a finish commercial game, therefore expect some issues.
